description:
In a move that has further strained the already tense US-China relations, the Biden administration has advanced plans to restrict American investments in key Chinese technology sectors. This decision, announced by the US Treasury Department, has sparked a swift and sharp rebuke from Beijing, highlighting the deepening rift between the world’s two largest economies. The... Read more »

The post US clamps down on China-bound investments appeared first on AI News.
title: US clamps down on China-bound investments
